channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump files $15B lawsuit against the New York Times
item.description: President Trump on Monday filed a $15 billion defamation lawsuit against The New York Times and four of its reporters, claiming the paper is a "a full...

item.title: Disney, NBCU, WBD sue Chinese AI firm MiniMax
item.description: The Walt Disney Company, NBCUniversal and Warner Bros. Discovery on Tuesday filed a joint lawsuit against Chinese AI firm MiniMax, alleging large-scal...

item.title: Republicans embrace speech limits after Charlie Kirk assassination
item.description: President Trump and MAGA spent years lampooning censorship, discrimination against conservatives, and progressive "cancel culture." Now in power — and...

item.title: What's different about the Charlie Kirk firings
item.description: Companies are reacting to pressure from Republican officials and right-wing activists and quickly firing anyone who attempts to justify or minimize th...

item.title: Patel says "original sin" in Epstein case was Acosta's handling
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel said during his Tuesday Senate testimony that the "original sin" in the investigation into sex offender Jeffrey Epstein was th...

item.title: Trump heads to U.K. for carefully choreographed state visit
item.description: President Donald Trump returns to the U.K. at the invitation of King Charles III, for a trip designed to avoid controversy and protests.

item.title: Former anti-Trump Republican is running for Georgia governor as a Democrat
item.description: Geoff Duncan, the state’s former lieutenant governor, sharply split with President Donald Trump over his efforts to overturn his 2020 reelection defea...

item.title: More employers fire workers over Kirk posts as pressure from right mounts
item.description: Actions by employers have stirred a debate over employees’ speech rights, the role of pressure campaigns and what is appropriate public debate after a...

item.title: Trump files defamation and libel lawsuit against New York Times
item.description: President Donald Trump accuses the newspaper and its reporters of defaming him in a book and three articles he said were “false, malicious, defamatory...

item.title: Tim Walz launches bid for reelection as Minnesota governor amid 2028 speculation
item.description: The Democratic governor is far better known nationally after serving as his party’s 2024 vice-presidential candidate.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
